title: Roasted Herb Pork Loin With Brussels Sprouts, Fennel, Apples An
summary: Need a gluten free and dairy free main course? Roasted Herb Pork Loin With Brussels Sprouts, Fennel, Apples An could be an outstanding recipe to try. One portion of this dish contains around 105g of protein, 19g of fat, and a total of 745 calories. This recipe serves 5 and costs $6.92 per serving. 13 people have made this recipe and would make it again. If you have wine, fennel bulbs, garlic, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 97%. This score is tremendous. Similar recipes include Pork Loin, Sweet Potato and Brussels Sprouts Casserole, Roasted Brussels Sprouts and Apples, and Roasted Brussels Sprouts & Apples.
